sanctum.html:
Thank You for Your Interest in Nurl Sanctum

Hello {{name}},

Thank you for your interest in joining the Nurl Sanctum beta program. We're excited about the possibility of working with {{companyName}} to transform your game development process.

Next Steps:

  1. Our team will review your application within 1-2 business days
  2. You'll receive an invitation to schedule an initial consultation
  3. We'll discuss your specific needs and timeline
  4. If approved, we'll begin your custom implementation

While you wait, explore some resources we've prepared for publishers:

  • Feature Overview
  • Publisher Case Studies
  • Development Blog

Have questions? Reply to this email or join our Publisher Network for immediate discussions.
